ParagonWiki.Wiki.TutorialDef.label: Soil fertility
ParagonWiki.Wiki.TutorialDef.description: Description of the soil fertility system
ParagonWiki.Wiki.TutorialDef.text:
Paragon has a more complicated system for growing crops, which makes it necessary to monitor the preservation of the fertile soil layer. Every sufficiently fertile surface will sooner or later lose its properties and degrade.
This can be prevented: - Timely application of fertilizers (Projects -> Terraforming -> Fertilize the soil) - Planting regenerative crops (Hay) - Autonomous machines for fertility restoration, for example: {Hyperlink(def="ElectricFertilizer", defType="ThingDef")}
